title: Take the cue train
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Lesley Hammond and Brian Bergin
brief_description: This film makes the point that training can help at all levels from grass roots to executive and that most of it can be done on the job. Examples from large and small industries, manufacturing and service industries emphasise the benefits of staff training.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation, Lesley Hammond and Brian Bergin
